Desktop publishing allows (i) _________ to do for themselves the work once reserved for professionals whose (ii) _________ or other training developed design skills along with narrow technical mastery.
Blank (i)
Blank (ii)
(A) dilettantes
(D) sensibility
(B) artisans
(E) acumen
(C)  idealogues
(F) apprenticeship
